quote1.name: Brian LeRoux
quote1.title: Principal Scientist
quote1.quote: Crosswalk helps Phonegap developers ensure a highly performant and consistent user experience across a wide breadth of mobile devices.

quote7.name: Nick Harlow
quote7.title: Director of Product Management
quote7.quote: Crosswalk solved the fragmentation problem for customers using Sencha's Web Application Manager. It also lowered our burden internally for building and maintaining the product.

quote5.name: Rob Lauer
quote5.title: Principal Product Manager
quote5.quote: Crosswalk levels the playing field for Android developers and enables them to create performant, feature-rich apps using the web skills they know and love. We advise all Telerik Platform users to target the Crosswalk webview for an instant performance boost!

quote6.name: Ian Maffet
quote6.title: Developer Advocate
quote6.quote: Crosswalk helps solve the fragmentation issue with Android and enables web applications to perform close to their native counterparts. We encourage all hybrid and Intel® XDK developers to deploy their Android applications using Crosswalk.

quote2.name: Max Woghiren
quote2.title: Software Engineer
quote2.quote: It’s finally possible to build hybrid apps that use a modern web view and run on almost every Android and iOS device released within the past three years.

quote3.name: Ashley Gullen
quote3.title: Creator of the Construct 2 game engine
quote3.quote: The Crosswalk Project looks like the new, best way to publish HTML5 content to Android.

quote4.name: Steve Newcomb
quote4.title: CEO and Co-founder
quote4.quote: Providing a modern Chrome webview is the key to delivering performant hybrid apps for Android, and the Crosswalk Project is the best way to do that.
